channel.title: 'hw' Dialect on CIRCT
channel.description: Recent content in 'hw' Dialect on CIRCT

item.title: HW Dialect Rationale
item.description: This document describes various design points of the hw dialect as well as global perspective on the hw, comb, and sv dialects, why they are the way they are, and current status. This follows in the spirit of other MLIR Rationale docs. For more information about the other dialects, please see the Comb Dialect Rationale and SV Dialect Rationale. HW Dialect Rationale General Introduction Introduction to the hw Dialect hw Type System hw.
